Package org.fluentjdbc

Class DbTableContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fluentjdbc.DbTableContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseQueryable<DbContextSelectBuilder>
    public class DbTableContext
extends Object
implements DatabaseQueryable<DbContextSelectBuilder>
    Provides a thread context oriented way of manipulating a table. Create from DbContext. All database operations must be nested in DbContext.startConnection(DataSource).

    Usage examples

     DbTableContext table = context.table("database_test_table");
 try (DbContextConnection ignored = context.startConnection(dataSource)) {
     table.insert().setField("code", 102).execute();
     table.query().where("key", key).orderBy("value").listStrings("value");
     table.where("id", id).update().setField("value", newValue).execute();
     table.where("id", id).delete();

     table.newSaveBuilderWithUUID("id", o.getId()).setField("name", o.getName()).execute();
 }

      • whereIn

        public DbContextSelectBuilder whereIn​(String fieldName,
                                      Collection<?> parameters)
        Creates a query() and adds "WHERE fieldName in (?, ?, ?)". If the parameter list is empty, instead adds WHERE fieldName <> fieldName, resulting in no rows being returned.
        Specified by:
        whereIn in interface DatabaseQueryable<DbContextSelectBuilder>

      • whereExpression

        public DbContextSelectBuilder whereExpression​(String expression,
                                              @Nullable
                                              Object value)
        Creates a query() and adds the expression to the WHERE-clause and the value to the parameter list. E.g. whereExpression("created_at > ?", earliestDate)
        Specified by:
        whereExpression in interface DatabaseQueryable<DbContextSelectBuilder>

      • whereExpressionWithMultipleParameters

        public DbContextSelectBuilder whereExpressionWithMultipleParameters​(String expression,
                                                                    Collection<?> parameters)
        Creates a query() and adds the expression to the WHERE-clause and all the values to the parameter list. E.g. whereExpression("created_at between ? and ?", List.of(earliestDate, latestDate))
        Specified by:
        whereExpressionWithMultipleParameters in interface DatabaseQueryable<DbContextSelectBuilder>

      • newSaveBuilder

        public DbSaveBuilderContext<Long> newSaveBuilder​(String idColumn,
                                                 Long idValue)
        Creates a DbSaveBuilderContext which creates a INSERT or UPDATE statement, depending on whether the row already exists in the database. If idValue is null, DbSaveBuilderContext will attempt to use the table's autogeneration of primary keys if there is no row with matching unique keys

      • newSaveBuilderWithString

        public DbSaveBuilderContext<String> newSaveBuilderWithString​(String idColumn,
                                                             String idValue)
        Creates a DbSaveBuilderContext which creates a INSERT or UPDATE statement, depending on whether the row already exists in the database. Throws exception if idValue is null

      • newSaveBuilderWithUUID

        public DbSaveBuilderContext<UUID> newSaveBuilderWithUUID​(String field,
                                                         UUID uuid)
        Creates a DbSaveBuilderContext which creates a INSERT or UPDATE statement, depending on whether the row already exists in the database. Generates UUID.randomUUID if idValue is null and row with matching unique keys does not already exist

      • save

        public <T> DbSaveBuilderContext<T> save​(DatabaseSaveBuilder<T> saveBuilder)
        Associates the argument DatabaseSaveResult with this DbTableContext's DbContext

      • cache

        public <KEY,​ENTITY> Optional<ENTITY> cache​(KEY key,
                                                 RetrieveMethod<KEY,​ENTITY> retriever)
        Retrieves the underlying or cached value of the retriever argument. This cache is per DbContextConnection and is evicted when the connection is closed. The key is in context of this table, so different tables can have the same key without collision

      • alias

        public DbTableAliasContext alias​(String alias)
        Create a DbTableAliasContext associated with this DbTableContext which can be used to JOIN statements with DbTableAliasContext.join(DatabaseColumnReference, DatabaseColumnReference).
        See Also:
        DbJoinedSelectContext
